title: Greg Van Avermaet Doesn’t Need to Win Unbound. He’d Still Like To.
content:
'I’m not here just to fill up the bunch but still to do a decent result. I think I’m still capable to do a good result if not too much happens and I can keep up with the front with the front group.'

Read the full article at Greg Van Avermaet Doesn’t Need to Win Unbound. He’d Still Like To. on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
